         <li> <a href="https://steveblank.com/2017/09/19/corporate-innovation-theory-versus-practice/">Removing the Roadblocks to Corporate Innovation – When Theory Meets&nbsp;Practice</a> </li> 
         <li> <a href="https://steveblank.com/2017/09/14/how-companies-strangle-innovation/">How companies strangle innovation – and how you can get it&nbsp;right</a> </li> 
         <li> <a href="https://steveblank.com/2017/08/12/working-outside-the-tech-bubble/">Working Outside the Tech&nbsp;Bubble</a> </li> 
         <li> <a href="https://steveblank.com/2017/08/07/hbr-ideacast/">You adapt, or you adopt, or you&nbsp;die</a> </li> 
         <li> <a href="https://steveblank.com/2017/07/25/turning-on-the-beach-boys-and-thoughts-and-corporate-innovation/">Why Corporate Innovation is Harder&nbsp;Now</a> </li> 
         <li> <a href="https://steveblank.com/2017/07/19/national-security-innovation-just-got-a-major-boost-in-washington/">National Security Innovation just got a major boost in&nbsp;Washington</a> </li> 
         <li> <a href="https://steveblank.com/2017/07/11/why-good-people-leave-tech-large-companies/">Why good people leave large tech&nbsp;companies</a> </li> 
         <li> <a href="https://steveblank.com/2017/06/27/why-you-cant-tell-a-company-be-more-like-a-startup/">Why a Company Can’t “Be More Like a&nbsp;Startup”</a> </li> 
         <li> <a href="https://steveblank.com/2017/06/21/a-moral-obligation/">We Have A Moral&nbsp;Obligation</a> </li> 
         <li> <a href="https://steveblank.com/2017/06/14/tesla-lost-700-million-last-year-so-why-is-teslas-valuation-60-billion/">Tesla Lost $700 Million Last Year, So Why Is Tesla’s Valuation $60&nbsp;Billion?</a> </li> 
        </ul> </li>

          <h2><a href="https://steveblank.com/tools-and-blogs-for-entrepreneurs/" rel="bookmark" title="Startup Tools">Startup Tools</a></h2> 
          <div class="entry"> 
           <h2>1. Startup Tools <a href="#startup-tools">Click Here</a></h2> 
           <h2>2. Lean LaunchPad Videos <a href="#LeanLaunchPadVideos">Click Here</a></h2>

           <h2>————–</h2> 
           <h2 id="startup-tools">Startup Tools</h2> 
           <h3><strong>Getting Started</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><span style="color:#ff0066;"><a href="http://hbr.org/2013/05/why-the-lean-start-up-changes-everything/ar/1" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span style="color:#ff0066;"><strong>Why the Lean Startup Changes Everything</strong></span></a></span> – Harvard Business Review</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.udacity.com/course/how-to-build-a-startup--ep245" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">The Lean LaunchPad Online </a></strong><a href="http://www.udacity.com/course/ep245" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">C</a>lass<strong> – FREE</strong></li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://steveblank.com/2011/09/22/how-to-build-a-web-startup-lean-launchpad-edition/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">How to Build a Web Startup</a> – </strong>Lean Launchpad Edition</li> 
            <li><a href="https://github.com/kriasoft/react-starter-kit" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>How to Build a Web App</strong></a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;isomoprhic web app boilerplate project&nbsp;(Node.js + Reactjs stack)</li> 
            <li><a href="http://playbook.samaltman.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>YCombinator Startup Playbook</strong></a> – Sam Altman</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.fourhourworkweek.com/blog/2011/09/24/how-to-create-a-million-dollar-business-this-weekend-examples-appsumo-mint-chihuahuas/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">How to Create a $1M Web Business</a></strong> – Noah Kagan</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Web Fundamentals</a> – </strong>Google<strong>&nbsp;</strong>developers</li> 
            <li><a href="http://quickmvp.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>QuickMVP</strong></a> – test your ideas</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.foundersuite.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>FoundersSuite</strong></a> – Startup Mgmt Software</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.cbinsights.com/blog/startup-failure-post-mortem" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Startup Failure Postmortems</strong></a> – CBinsights</li> 
            <li><span style="color:#ff0000;"><a style="color:#ff0000;" href="http://playbook.cio.gov" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>The U.S. Digital Service Playbook</strong></a></span> – sheer and practical genius 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="https://github.com/whitehouse/playbook" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Whitehouse/playbook</a> – Github</li> 
              <li><a href="http://playbook.cio.gov/techfar/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">The TechFAR Handbook</a>&nbsp;– how to hack&nbsp;Federal Acquisition Regulations (FAR)</li> 
              <li><a href="https://18f.gsa.gov" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">GSA 18F </a>– Digital Services Delivery 
               <ul> 
                <li><a href="https://cloud.gov" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Cloud.gov</a>&nbsp;– U.S. government cloud innovation platform</li> 
                <li><a href="https://18f.gsa.gov/2016/01/11/introducing-the-css-coding-style-guide/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CSS coding style guide</a> – 18F</li> 
                <li><a href="https://github.com/18F/api.data.gov" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">API.data.gov</a> –&nbsp;API key, analytics, and proxy solution for government web services</li> 
               </ul> </li> 
             </ul> </li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3><strong>Lists of Tools from Others</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://libraries.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Libraries.io</a> </strong>–&nbsp;open source libraries, modules and frameworks</li> 
            <li><a href="https://sites.google.com/site/startuptribe/general-information/communications" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">HBS Startup Tribe Tools List</a> – from Tom Eisenmann at HBS</li> 
            <li><a href="http://entrepreneur.nyu.edu/resources/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">NYU Startup Resources Library</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://startupstash.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">StartupStash</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;Bram Kanstein</li> 
            <li><a href="http://ilab.harvard.edu" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Harvard Innovation Lab</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://startuptools.pbworks.com/w/page/17974963/FrontPage" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">PBworks startup tools List</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://startupweekend.org/resources/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Startup Weekend tools list</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://ycombinator.com/lib.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Y Combinator Startup Library</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://triplecrownleadership.com/resources/resources-on-entrepreneurship/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Triple Crown Leadership Resources</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://startupresources.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Startup Resources</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://list.ly/list/9E-tools-and-services-for-a-lean-startup" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Lean Startup Tools and Services</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://toolboard.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Toolboard</a> -web and startup tools</li> 
            <li><a href="http://thestartupfoundry.com/2011/02/18/startup-toolbox-a-resource-for-startups/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Startup Foundry tools list</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://smallbiztrends.com/2011/03/101-small-business-web-applications.html?utm_source=feedburner&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=Feed%3A+SmallBusinessTrends+%28Small+Business+Trends%29" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Small Business tools list</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.sbtdc.org/resources/web.asp" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Market research list</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://topalternatives.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">TopAlternatives</a> – best tools for your website</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.softwareadvice.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Software Advice</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=5235137" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Tools of the Trade 2013</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.getapp.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">GetApp</a>&nbsp;– business software reviews</li> 
            <li><a href="http://alternativeto.net" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">AlternativeTo</a> – alternatives to expensive software</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.apptamin.com/blog/app-developer-tools/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">AppMarketing Tools for developers</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://blog.bigml.com/2013/02/28/data-data-data-thousands-of-public-data-sources/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Public Data Sources</a></li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3><strong>Groups</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://startupweekend.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Startup Weekend</a></strong> – Launch a Startup in 54 hours</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://theleanstartupmachine.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">The Lean Startup Machine</a></strong> –&nbsp;Launch a Startup in 48 hours</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.startupmonthly.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Startup Monthly</strong></a> – Launch a Startup in a month</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://startupgrind.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Startup Grind </a></strong>–&nbsp;community looking to be educated, and network with the smartest startup minds</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://groups.google.com/group/lean-startup-circle" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Lean Startup Circle</a></strong>&nbsp;– Google Group for startup advice</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.women2.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Women 2.0</a></strong> – Launch a startup for women</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.meetup.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Meetup</a></strong> – Meet people you’re interested in</li> 
            <li><a href="http://blog.clarity.fm/top-north-american-conferences-for-entrepreneurs/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Top Startup Conferences</strong></a> (North America)</li> 
           </ul> 
           <div> 
            <h3><strong>Find a Co-Founder</strong></h3> 
            <ul> 
             <li><a href="http://founderdating.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>FounderDating</strong></a>&nbsp;– premiere site for founders/co-founders</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.cofounderslab.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>CoFoundersLab</strong></a>&nbsp;– find a co-founder in any city</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.younoodle.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>YouNoodle</strong></a>&nbsp;– founder matching</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.codearmy.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>CodeArmy</strong></a> – CTO’s for Non-Tech Founders</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.founders-nation.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>FoundersNation</strong></a> – founders in Israel, London &amp; NY</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.gsb.stanford.edu/ces/community/interns.html#Guidelines_for_Participation" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Stanford Business School Interns</strong></a> – hire a Stanford &nbsp;Bus School intern cheap</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="https://angel.co/jobs" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">AngelList</a></strong> – Angel List jobs board</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://startupweekend.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Startup Weekend</a></strong>&nbsp;– Launch a Startup and meet a co-founder</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="https://www.gallupstrengthscenter.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Founder Strengths</a></strong> – Gallup Strengths Center</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://www.meetup.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Meetup</a></strong>&nbsp;– go to a Meetup!</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://numeratechoir.com/why-developers-arent-interested-in-your-startup/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">How to hire developers</a>&nbsp;– </strong>mike greenfield</li> 
            </ul> 
            <h3>Developer Bootcamps</h3> 
            <ul> 
             <li><a href="http://www.thinkful.com/bootcamps/all" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Programing Bootcamp Finder</strong></a> –</li> 
             <li><a href="http://devpost.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>DevPost</strong></a> –&nbsp;Follow hackathons around the work</li> 
            </ul> 
            <h3><strong>Job Interviewing Tools</strong></h3> 
            <ul class="postList"> 
             <li id="53cb" class="graf graf--li graf-after--p"><strong><a class="markup--anchor markup--li-anchor" href="https://www.interviewcake.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">InterviewCake</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>&nbsp;resource for data structures and algorithms</li> 
             <li class="graf graf--li graf-after--p"><strong><a class="markup--anchor markup--li-anchor" href="https://www.hiredintech.com/classrooms/system-design/lesson/60" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">HiredInTech’s System Design Section</a></strong>&nbsp;–&nbsp;&nbsp;guide for system design interview questions</li> 
             <li id="f644" class="graf graf--li graf-after--li"><strong><a class="markup--anchor markup--li-anchor" href="https://www.educative.io/collection/5642554087309312/5679846214598656" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Coderust</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>solutions in almost any programming language, with interactive diagrams</li> 
             <li id="c377" class="graf graf--li graf-after--li"><strong><a class="markup--anchor markup--li-anchor" href="https://www.reddit.com/r/cscareerquestions/comments/1jov24/heres_how_to_prepare_for_tech_interviews/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Reddit’s How to Prepare for Tech Interviews</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>&nbsp;a benchmark for interview prep</li> 
             <li id="d9c7" class="graf graf--li graf-after--li"><strong><a class="markup--anchor markup--li-anchor" href="https://github.com/h5bp/Front-end-Developer-Interview-Questions" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Front End Interview Questions</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>&nbsp;exhaustive&nbsp;list of front-end questions</li> 
             <li id="94ea" class="graf graf--li graf-after--li"><strong><a class="markup--anchor markup--li-anchor" href="https://leetcode.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Leetcode</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>&nbsp;resource for algorithm and data structure questions</li> 
            </ul> 
            <h3><strong>Tools from Steve: </strong>Lean Startup/Business Model Canvas/Customer Development Tools</h3>

             <li><strong><a href="http://www.guidearama.com/guides/fwb.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Founders Workbook</a></strong>&nbsp;– A Checklist for the Startup Owners Manual</li>

            <p><strong>Business Model Canvas</strong></p> 
            <ul> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/business-model-toolbox/id431605371?mt=8" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Business Model Toolbox</a></strong> – iPad app from the master himself!</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://www.businessmodelgeneration.com/canvas" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Business Model Canvas</a></strong> – free downloadable Canvas</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://www.alexandercowan.com/resources/planning-tactics/business-model-canvas-templates" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Tutorial on how to use the Canvas</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>Alex Cowan</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://businessmodelpress.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Business Model Press</a></strong> – business model plugin for WordPress</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://bmdesigner.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Business Model Designer</a></strong> – a web Canvas tool</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="https://www.launchpadcentral.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">LaunchPad Central</a>&nbsp;</strong>– the standard for Bus Model Canvas/Customer Development progress for companies/incubators/accelerators</li> 
             <li><a href="https://mural.ly" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Mural.ly</strong></a> –&nbsp;Visual collaboration for creative people</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://canvanizer.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Canvasizer</a></strong> – create and edit a canvas</li> 
            </ul> 
            <p><strong>Customer Development</strong></p> 
            <ul> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://www.businessmodelalchemist.com/2012/08/achieve-product-market-fit-with-our-brand-new-value-proposition-designer.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Product/Market Fit:&nbsp;the&nbsp;Value&nbsp;Proposition&nbsp;Canvas</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>Alex Osterwalder</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://www.businessmodelalchemist.com/2012/09/test-your-value-proposition-supercharge-lean-startup-and-custdev-principles.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Testing Product/Market Fit:&nbsp;Value&nbsp;Proposition&nbsp;Canvas</a> – </strong>Alex Osterwalder</li>

             <li><strong><a href="http://www.businessmodelgeneration.com/downloads/businessmodelgeneration_preview.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Business Model Canvas Tutorial</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>steve blank</li>

            <h3><strong>Create Mobile Apps&nbsp;Automagically</strong></h3> 
            <ul> 
             <li><a href="https://app-press.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>AppPress</strong></a> – make a mobile app without coding</li> 
             <li><a href="http://bubble.is" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Bubble</strong></a> –&nbsp;enables your to program web and mobile apps without code</li> 
             <li><a href="https://appery.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>appery</strong></a> – mobile app builder and MBaaS</li> 
            </ul> 
            <h3><strong>Create Websites Automagically</strong></h3> 
            <ul> 
             <li><a href="http://www.bootstrapwebsite.com/build-website-blog/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>How to build a website</strong></a> –&nbsp;Ray Tan</li> 
             <li><a href="https://developers.google.com/web/starter-kit/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Web Starter Kit</strong></a>&nbsp;– Google</li> 
             <li><a href="https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Web Fundamentals</strong></a>&nbsp;– Google</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://www.edicy.com/en" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Edicy</a></strong>&nbsp;– Create a website</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.webs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Webs</strong></a>&nbsp;– Create a free website</li> 
             <li><a href="https://www.strikingly.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Strikingly</strong></a> – build mobile-optimized websites</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.squarespace.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Squarespace</strong></a>&nbsp;– build an exceptional website</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.wix.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Wix</strong></a>&nbsp;– free website builder</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.moonfruit.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Moonfruit</strong></a> – free website/mobile builder</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://www.pagelines.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Pagelines</a></strong>&nbsp;– build a website with WordPress</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://www.zozolo.com/">Zozolo</a></strong><strong>&nbsp;</strong>– start a website within Facebook</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.plinqs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Plinqs</strong></a>&nbsp;-simple web page creation</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="https://sites.google.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">GoogleSites</a></strong>&nbsp;– simple web host provider 
              <ul> 
               <li><a href="http://www.google.com/tagmanager/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Google tag manager</a> –&nbsp;create and update tags for your website and mobile apps</li> 
              </ul> </li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.weebly.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Weebly</strong></a><strong>&nbsp;</strong>– get a website up quickly with no tools</li> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://www.yola.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Yola</a></strong>&nbsp;– get a website up quickly with no tools</li> 
            </ul> 
           </div> 
           <h3><strong>“How Big is the Market?” Tools</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.google.com/trends" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Google Trends</a>&nbsp;</strong>– what are the search trends for key items</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.google.com/insights/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Google Insights</a></strong>&nbsp;–&nbsp;breaks down the search data by location</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.facebook.com/advertising/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Facebook ads</a></strong>&nbsp;– check out the total available market</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3><strong>“How Do I Contact Customers?” Tools</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><a href="http://blog.linkedin.com/2012/09/20/the-best-way-to-network-with-alumni-on-linkedin/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>LinkedIn Alumni</strong></a> – awesome way to contact school alumni</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.data.com/connect/index.jsp" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Data.Com</strong></a> – find business connections</li>

            <li><a href="https://www1.toutapp.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Toutapp</strong></a> – sales email tracking, templates and analytics</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://rapportive.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Rapportive</a></strong> – find Linkedin profies&nbsp;inside of Gmail</li>

           <p><a href="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31.png"><img data-attachment-id="18459" data-permalink="https://steveblank.com/tools-and-blogs-for-entrepreneurs/lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31/" data-orig-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31.png" data-orig-size="1500,1125" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;orientation&quot;:&quot;0&quot;}" data-image-title="lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31.png?w=300" data-large-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31.png?w=468&amp;h=351" class="aligncenter size-large wp-image-18459" src="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31.png?w=468&amp;h=351" alt="lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31" width="468" height="351" srcset="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31.png?w=468&amp;h=351 468w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31.png?w=936&amp;h=702 936w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31.png?w=150&amp;h=113 150w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31.png?w=300&amp;h=225 300w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/lumadisplayadtechlandscape2010-12-31.png?w=768&amp;h=576 768w" sizes="(max-width: 468px) 100vw, 468px"></a></p> 
           <h3><strong>On-Line Advertising Platforms (SEO)</strong></h3> 
           <div> 
            <ul> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://www.google.com/ads/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Google Ads</a></strong></li> 
             <li><strong><a href="https://adwords.google.com/o/KeywordTool" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Google Keywords Tool</a></strong> 
              <ul> 
               <li><a href="https://adwords.google.com/KeywordPlanner" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Google Adwords Keyword Planner</a> –&nbsp;search for new keywords or ad group</li> 
               <li><a href="http://translate.google.com/globalmarketfinder/g/index.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Google Market Finder</a> – find the right adwords globally</li> 
               <li><a href="https://www.google.com/trends/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Google Trends</a> – what are people searching for?</li> 
               <li><a href="https://www.google.com/trends/correlate" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Google Corrolate</a><strong>&nbsp;</strong> – find searches that correlate with real world data</li> 
               <li><a href="http://ubersuggest.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Ubersuggest</a> – keyword suggestion tool/google suggest scraper</li> 
               <li><a href="http://www.google.com/intl/en_US/adwordseditor/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Google Adwords Editor</a> –&nbsp;manage large AdWords accounts</li> 
               <li><a href="https://www.thinkwithgoogle.com/tools/customer-journey-to-online-purchase.html#!/the-us/internet-and-telecom/large/generic-paid-search" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Think with Google</a> – awesome channel tutorial to online purchases by market</li> 
              </ul> </li> 
             <li><strong><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/ads/start" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">LinkedIn Ads</a>&nbsp;</strong></li> 
             <li><strong><a href="https://www.facebook.com/advertising/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Facebook Ads</a></strong> 
              <ul> 
               <li><a href="https://www.facebook.com/help/162528860609436/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Facebook PowerEditor</a> –&nbsp;bulk ad creation and mgmt&nbsp;tool – works only in Chrome</li> 
               <li><a href="https://www.driftrock.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">DriftRock</a> – facebook ad tools</li> 
               <li><a href="http://www.qwaya.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Qwaya</a> – Facebook ad tools</li> 
               <li><a href="http://adespresso.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">AdExpresso</a> – Optimize Facebook ads</li> 
              </ul> </li> 
             <li><strong><a href="https://adcenter.microsoft.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Bing &amp; Yahoo Ads</a></strong></li>

           <h3><strong>IoT (Internet of Things) Analytics</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><a href="http://tellient.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Tellient</strong></a> – the only analytics platform built specifically for the IoT</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.firstanalytics.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>First Analytics</strong></a> – predict time-to-failure for industrial equipment or solve complex optimization problems involving industrial IoT</li> 
            <li><a href="http://uptake.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Uptake</strong></a> – IoT and data analytics company</li> 
           </ul>

            <li><strong><a href="http://myemma.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Emma</a></strong> – basic email marketing</li> 
            <li><a href="https://replyboss.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>ReplyBoss</strong></a> -simple, automated email marketing</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.boomeranggmail.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Boomerang</strong></a> – scheduled sending and email reminders for gmail</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.streak.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Streak</a></strong>– CRM inside of&nbsp;Gmail</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3>Transactional Email</h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><a href="http://mailgun.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Mailgun</strong></a> – mail server API’s for developers</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://sendgrid.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SendGrid</a></strong>&nbsp;– email blast software</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://postmarkapp.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Postmark</a></strong>&nbsp;– email blast&nbsp;and mgmt software for web apps</li> 
            <li><a href="https://aws.amazon.com/ses/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Amazon SES</strong></a> – Simple Email Service on AWS 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="https://emailoctopus.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>EmailOctopus</strong></a> – email marketing via Amazon SES</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="https://appmail.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>AppMail</strong></a> – send email from inside your app</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.yesware.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Yesware</a></strong> – email tracking</li> 
            <li><a href="http://postcron.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Postcron</strong></a> – schedule posts on Twitter or Facebook</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.mailjet.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Mailjet</strong></a> – bulk and marketing email</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://smtpprovider.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SmtpProvider</a></strong> – bulk email</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.jangomail.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>JangoMail</strong></a>&nbsp;– marketing and transactional email</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.silverpop.com/marketing-solutions/transactional-emails.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Silverpop</strong></a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;transactional email</li> 
            <li><a href="http://postageapp.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>PostageApp</strong></a> – API for transactional emails</li> 
            <li><a href="https://github.com/atech/postal" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>atech/postal</strong></a> – Opensource alternative to Mailgun and Sendgrid</li> 
           </ul>

           <h3><strong>Wireframing Tools</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><a href="http://www.adub.net/post/43944830969/ux-basics-for-startups" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Read this UX tutorial first</strong></a>&nbsp;– Alan Wells 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://www.feld.com/wp/archives/2013/01/who-owns-your-ux-philosophy.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Then read Brad Felds article and the comments</a></li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://spreadsheets.google.com/pub?key=pOa2Uqiakxlry5hNuZm89Eg&amp;output=html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Great list of rapid prototyping tools here</a></strong>&nbsp;–&nbsp;dan harrelson</li> 
            <li><a href="https://developers.google.com/web/starter-kit/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Web Starter Kit</strong></a> – Google</li> 
            <li><a href="https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Web Fundamentals</strong></a> – Google</li> 
            <li><a href="http://popapp.in" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>POP</strong></a> – Prototyping on paper for&nbsp;mobile phones – awesome</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://keynotopia.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Keynotopia</a></strong> – use PowerPoint/Keynote to create web/mobile apps – Cool!</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.leandesigns.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Lean Design</a>&nbsp;</strong>–&nbsp;design using HTML5-editor and automatically convert it to XHTML/CSS</li> 
            <li><a href="http://sass-lang.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Saas</strong></a> – CSS Extension Language</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://balsamiq.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Balsamiq</a></strong>– rapid wireframing tool. software mockups in minutes 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://www.napkee.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Napkee</a> –&nbsp;export&nbsp;Balsamiq Mockups&nbsp;to HTML/CSS/JS and Adobe Flex 3 at a click of a button</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://justinmind.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Justinmind</a> – </strong>mac/pc mobile and web highly interactive prototypes 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://www.justinmind.com/justinmind-usernote" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">JustinMind UserNote&nbsp;</a>– get user feedback/test usability</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.heflo.com/free-business-process-modeling-software/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Heflo</a>&nbsp;</strong>– business process modeling</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.fluidui.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>FluidU/I</strong> </a>– mobile prototypes for IOS</li> 
            <li><a href="http://giveabrief.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Briefs</strong></a> – mac prototyping tool for iOS</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.flinto.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Flinto</strong></a>– &nbsp;web prototyping tool for iOS and Android from your screen designs</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.invisionapp.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Invision</strong></a> – web and mobile iOS and android prototyping &amp; collaboration tools for design</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://proto.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Proto.io</a>&nbsp;</strong>– web&nbsp;prototyping tool for iOS and Android</li> 
            <li><a href="http://solidifyapp.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Solidify</strong></a> – web&nbsp;prototyping&nbsp;clickable mobile prototypes</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.axure.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Axure</strong></a> – mac/pc wireframe software &amp; mockup tool</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.irise.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>Irise</strong></a> – wireframes and prototypes. Inline requirements management. Real-time collaboration</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.protoshare.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Protoshare</a></strong>&nbsp;– web prototyping tools for web &amp; mobile&nbsp;wireframing</li> 
            <li><a href="https://pidoco.com/en" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Pidoco</strong></a> – online wire framing</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.appcooker.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>AppCooker</strong></a> – iOS mockup, wireframe or prototype</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.draw.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Draw.io</strong></a> – draw diagrams online</li> 
            <li><a href="https://moqups.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Moqups</strong></a> –&nbsp;HTML5 App used to create wireframes, mockups or UI concepts</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.jgraph.com/mxgraph.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>MxGraph</strong></a> – client side JavaScript diagramming library</li>

            <li><strong><a href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/pencil/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Pencil</a></strong>–&nbsp;Firefox add-on to do GUI prototyping and simple sketching</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://lumzy.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Lumzy</a></strong> – quick mockup creation and prototyping</li> 
            <li><a href="http://csshat.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>CSS Hat</strong></a> – Turn Photoshop layers into CSS3</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://mockflow.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mockflow</a></strong> – online/offline, extensible wireframing tool w/design library</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.omnigroup.com/products/omnigraffle/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">OmniGraffle</a></strong> – it’s been around before the web even existed</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.volkside.com/2010/12/introducing-wirify-the-web-as-wireframes/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Wirify</a></strong> – turn any webpage into a wireframe</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.lucidchart.com/"><strong>LucidChart</strong></a><strong> – </strong>Cloud-based drawing tool</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.lucidpress.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">LucidPress</a></strong> – Cloud-based create and print digital documents</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://cacoo.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Cacoo</a></strong> – free online drawing tool</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.hotgloo.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">HotGloo</a></strong> – Online Wireframing Tool</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://mocksup.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mocksup</a></strong> – Share your web site mockups</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://gomockingbird.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mockingbird</a></strong> –&nbsp;Mock it up and share web site wireframes</li> 
            <li><a href="http://creately.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Creately</strong></a> – online diagraming and collaboration</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.gliffy.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Gliffy</a></strong> – Online Diagraming</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://keynotopia.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Keynotopia</a></strong> –&nbsp;wireframing + high fidelity (pixel perfect) prototyping tool</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.farengambrill.com/2011/02/22/free-wireframing-templates-for-iphone-ipad-and-website-design/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Free Wireframe templates</a></strong> for iPhone, iPad and Web</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.webdesignerdepot.com/2009/07/using-wireframes-to-streamline-your-development-process/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Wireframing Tutorial</a></strong></li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3><strong>Markdown –&nbsp;text&nbsp;to&nbsp;HTML&nbsp;Text Style editor</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/">Markdown</a> –&nbsp;</strong>John Gruber’s original&nbsp;<a href="http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/">markdown</a>&nbsp;syntax</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mastering Markdown</a> –&nbsp;</strong> github</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://commonmark.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CommonMark</a></strong> – strongly specified, highly compatible implementation of Markdown</li> 
            <li><a href="http://johnmacfarlane.net/babelmark2/faq.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>BabelMark2</strong></a> –&nbsp;tool for comparing the output of various implementations of John Gruber’s&nbsp;<a href="http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/">markdown</a>&nbsp;syntax</li> 
            <li><a href="https://github.com/michelf/mdtest/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>MDtest</strong></a> – Michael Fortin’s test suite for Markdown implementations</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://mouapp.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mou</a></strong>&nbsp;– markdown editor for Mac</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://alternativeto.net/software/mou/?platform=windows" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Markdown editors&nbsp;for Windows</a></strong></li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/marked/id448925439?mt=12" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Marked</a></strong>&nbsp;– provides a preview of your Markdown as you work in a text editor</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://dillinger.io/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Dillinger</a></strong>&nbsp;– free online markdown editor that syncs with Dropbox, Google Drive and Github.</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3><strong>Web Drawing Libraries</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://paperjs.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Paperjs</a>&nbsp;–</strong>&nbsp;vector graphics scripting framework runs on HTML5 Canvas</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://processingjs.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Processingjs</a></strong> –&nbsp;vector graphics scripting framework runs on HTML5 Canvas</li> 
            <li><a href="http://verbnurbs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Verb</strong></a>&nbsp;-Javascript CAD Library for manipulating NURB surfaces on the web</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.cgal.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CGAL</a></strong> – Computational Geometry Algorithms Library –&nbsp;gold standard for geometric libraries</li> 
           </ul>

            <li><a href="http://www.beyondverbal.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>BeyondVerbal</strong></a> – Emotions analytics</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.nemesysco.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Nemesysco</strong></a> – voice analysis</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.operavox.co.uk" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>OperaVox</strong></a> – voice analysis</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3><strong>Learning to Code</strong></h3> 
           <ul class="postList"> 
            <li class="graf graf--li graf-after--p"><a href="http://hyperpolyglot.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Programming Languages and Tools compared</strong></a> – Hyperpolyglot</li> 
            <li class="graf graf--li graf-after--p"><a href="https://learnxinyminutes.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Learn a programming language in minutes</strong></a> – adam bard</li> 
            <li id="defc" class="graf graf--li graf-after--p"><em class="markup--em markup--li-em">Apple iOS (Apple’s operating system for their phones and tablets) to build games or apps in the App Store:</em>&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://developer.apple.com/swift/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Swift</a></strong>, <strong><a href="https://developer.apple.com/library/content/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/ProgrammingWithObjectiveC/Introduction/Introduction.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Objective C</a></strong></li> 
            <li id="f1ce" class="graf graf--li graf-after--li"><em class="markup--em markup--li-em">Web games or apps:</em> <strong><a href="http://www.djangoproject.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Django</a></strong></li> 
            <li id="e583" class="graf graf--li graf-after--li"><em class="markup--em markup--li-em">Websites</em>: python, ruby, java. You can think of these as foundational languages, especially Java 
             <ul> 
              <li id="b34e" class="graf graf--li graf-after--p">HTML/CSS: this is how a website sets up its visual look and feel, color, information organization, etc.</li> 
              <li id="8cf5" class="graf graf--li graf-after--li">SQL: how data in databases gets constructed and accessed</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li class="graf graf--li graf-after--li"><strong><a href="http://blog.teamtreehouse.com/choose-programming-language" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">How to Choose a Programming Language</a></strong> – Treehouse</li> 
            <li class="graf graf--li graf-after--li"><strong><a href="https://www.codecademy.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Codeacademy</a></strong> – learn to code online for free</li> 
            <li class="graf graf--li graf-after--li"><a href="https://code.org/learn" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>An Hour of Code</strong></a> – code.org</li> 
            <li class="graf graf--li graf-after--li"><a href="https://lagunita.stanford.edu/courses/Engineering/CS101/Summer2014/about" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Computer Science 101</strong></a> – Stanford self-paced class</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3><strong>Application Frameworks</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.bentobox.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Bento</a>&nbsp;– </strong>everything you need to know about web development</li>

            <li><strong><a href="http://andrewchenblog.com/2012/04/01/visual-basic-php-rails-is-node-js-next/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Visual Basic, PHP, Rails, Node.js next?</a></strong>&nbsp;– Andrew Chen</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://libraries.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Libraries.io</a>&nbsp;</strong>–&nbsp;open source libraries, modules and frameworks</li> 
            <li><strong>PHP</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://cakephp.org/"><strong>CakePHP</strong></a>&nbsp;– a PHP open source framework</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.codeigniter.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>CodeIgniter</strong></a> –&nbsp;&nbsp;open source&nbsp;rapid development<a title="Web application framework" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_application_framework">&nbsp;</a>framework&nbsp;for building dynamic web sites</li> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://www.symfony-project.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Symfony</a></strong> – another PHP framework 
               <ul> 
                <li><strong><a href="http://silex.sensiolabs.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Silex</a></strong>&nbsp;– PHP web micro framework based on Symofony2</li> 
               </ul> </li> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://www.zend.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Zend</a></strong> – yet another PHP framework</li> 
              <li><a href="http://slimframework.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Slim</strong></a> – PHP web Micro-framework</li> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://www.w3schools.com/php/php_intro.asp" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">PHP Tutorial</a>&nbsp;</strong>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<strong><a href="http://www.php.net/manual/en/install.php" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">PHP Manual</a></strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;and&nbsp;<strong><a href="http://www.phpfreaks.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Freaks</a></strong></li>

            <li><strong>Python</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://wsgi.readthedocs.org/en/latest/learn.html"><strong>WSGI</strong></a>&nbsp;tutorials (Web Server Gateway Interface)</li> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://www.djangoproject.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Django</a></strong>&nbsp;– high-level Python framework</li> 
              <li><a href="http://devblogs.nvidia.com/parallelforall/numbapro-high-performance-python-cuda-acceleration/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>NumbaPro</strong></a> – high&nbsp;performance python with nvidia cuda acceleration</li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Pycharm</strong></a> – Python/Django Integrated Dev Environment</li> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://www.fabfile.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Fabric</a></strong>&nbsp;– django deployment tool</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.numpy.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Numpy</strong></a> – core library&nbsp;for scientific computing with Python 
               <ul> 
                <li><a href="http://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Scipy</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;functions that operate on numpy arrays</li> 
               </ul> </li> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://twistedmatrix.com/trac/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Twisted</a></strong> – implement custom network apps,&nbsp;event-driven networking engine written in Python</li> 
             </ul> 
             <ul> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://www.tornadoweb.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Tornado</a></strong> – Python&nbsp;web framework and asynchronous networking library</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.web2py.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Web2py</strong></a> –&nbsp;Pythonweb framework</li> 
              <li><a href="http://bobo.digicool.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Bobo</strong></a> – light-weight framework to create WSGI web applications for python</li> 
              <li><a href="http://bottlepy.org/docs/dev/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Bottle</strong></a> –&nbsp;lightweight&nbsp;WSGI&nbsp;micro web-framework for&nbsp;Python</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.cherrypy.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>CherryPy</strong></a> – minimalist Python web framework</li> 
              <li><a href="http://flask.pocoo.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Flask</strong></a> –&nbsp;microframework for Python based on Werkzeug, Jinja 2</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.pylonsproject.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Pyramid</strong></a> -microframework for Python</li> 
              <li><a href="https://github.com/toastdriven/itty/"><strong>itty-bitty</strong></a> –&nbsp;itty-bitty Python web framework</li> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://webpy.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">web.py</a>&nbsp;</strong>–&nbsp;web framework for Python</li> 
              <li><a href="http://pythonhosted.org/wheezy.web/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>WheezyWeb</strong></a> –&nbsp;lightweight,&nbsp;high performance, high concurrency&nbsp;WSGI&nbsp;web framework</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong>Ruby</strong> 
             <ul>

               </ul> </li>

            <li><strong>JavaScript/JScript</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://nodejs.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Node.js</a></strong>&nbsp;–&nbsp;&nbsp;event-driven&nbsp;I/O&nbsp;server-side JavaScript&nbsp;environment based on&nbsp;V8 
               <ul> 
                <li><a href="http://blog.modulus.io/absolute-beginners-guide-to-nodejs" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Beginners Guide to Node.js</a>&nbsp;– Brandon Cannaday<a href="https://plus.google.com/103192594269272173154/posts" target="_blank" rel="author noopener noreferrer"><br> </a></li> 
               </ul> 
               <ul> 
                <li><a href="http://expressjs.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Express</a>.js&nbsp;–&nbsp;web development for&nbsp;Node.js</li> 
                <li><a href="http://angularjs.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Angularjs</a> –&nbsp;an&nbsp;open-source&nbsp;JavaScript&nbsp;framework, &nbsp;assists with running&nbsp;single-page applications</li> 
                <li><a href="http://backbonejs.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Backbone.js</a> –&nbsp;&nbsp;RESTful&nbsp;JSON&nbsp;interface and is based on MVP</li> 
                <li><a href="http://flatironjs.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Flatiron</a> – framework for web apps with Javascript and Node.js</li> 
                <li><a href="http://hapijs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Hapi</a> – server frameworks for Node.js for web apps &amp; services</li> 
                <li><a href="https://github.com/koajs/koa" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Koa</a> – middleware for Node.js using generators</li> 
                <li><a href="http://www.partialjs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Partial.js</a> – web application framework for node.js</li> 
                <li><a href="http://www.socketstream.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Socketstream </a>– node.js web framework for real-time single page apps</li> 
                <li><a href="http://stackabuse.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Stack Abuse</a> –&nbsp;tutorials on using Node.js</li> 
                <li><a href="https://www.npmjs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">nam</a> – tools for the npm package manager</li> 
               </ul> </li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.json.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">JSON</a> –&nbsp;lightweight data-interchange format, subset of <a href="http://javascript.crockford.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Javascript</a></li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.sproutcore.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SproutCore</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;open-source&nbsp;JavaScript&nbsp;framework</li> 
              <li><a href="http://jquery.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">jQuery</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;cross-browser JavaScript library 
               <ul> 
                <li><a href="http://jqueryui.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">jQuery UI</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;official jQuery user interface library. interactions, widgets, effects</li> 
                <li><a href="http://docs.jquery.com/Tutorials" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Javascript tutorial</a>&nbsp;– jQuery</li> 
                <li><a href="http://plugins.jquery.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">JQuery Plugins</a>&nbsp;– registry</li> 
               </ul> </li> 
              <li><a href="http://cappuccino.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Cappuccino</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;JS development framework</li> 
              <li><a href="http://turfjs.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Turf</a> –&nbsp;<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JavaScript_library">JavaScript library</a>&nbsp;for&nbsp;<a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spatial_analysis">spatial analysis</a></li> 
              <li><a href="http://gruntjs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Grunt</a> – Javascript task runner 
               <ul> 
                <li><a href="https://github.com/joliss/broccoli" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Broccoli</a> –&nbsp;build tool for applications that run in the browser</li> 
                <li><a href="http://gulpjs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Gulp</a> – streaming Build system</li> 
               </ul> </li> 
              <li><a href="http://jsfiddle.net/">JSFiddle</a><strong>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>preselect/add JavaScript frameworks and test your code</li> 
              <li><a href="http://facebook.github.io/react/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">React</a>.js&nbsp;– Javascript library for building user interfaces 
               <ul> 
                <li><a href="https://facebook.github.io/relay/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Relay</a> –&nbsp;Facebook&nbsp;framework provides data-fetching functionality for React apps</li> 
               </ul> </li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.getbreezenow.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Breeze.js</a> –&nbsp;rich data management for&nbsp;Javascript clients</li> 
              <li><a href="http://knockoutjs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Knockout.js</a> – dynamic UI’s with Model-View-Model pattern</li> 
              <li><a href="http://lhorie.github.io/mithril/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mithril</a> – client-side&nbsp;Javascript Framework</li> 
              <li><a href="http://emberjs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Ember.js </a>–&nbsp;Javascript library for&nbsp;creating ambitious web applications</li> 
              <li><a href="http://handlebarsjs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Handlebars</a> – build semantic templates</li> 
              <li><a href="http://modernizr.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Modernizr</a> – javascript library with feature detection for HTML5/CSS3</li> 
              <li><a href="https://code.google.com/p/swfobject/wiki/documentation" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SWFObject</a> – embed Flash with one Javascript file</li> 
              <li><a href="http://rmurphey.com/blog/2012/04/12/a-baseline-for-front-end-developers/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Baseline for front end developers</a>&nbsp;– good summary</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://clojure.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Clojure</a> </strong>– dynamic programming language,&nbsp;compiles directly to java virtual machine&nbsp;bytecode 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://www.braveclojure.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Learn&nbsp;Clojure</a><strong>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>clojure tutorial</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong>Adobe ColdFusion</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://www.adobe.com/products/coldfusion-family.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">AdobeColdFusion</a> –&nbsp;application server&nbsp;offers to&nbsp;build and deploy web and mobile applications</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong>The Go Programming Language</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://tip.golang.org/project/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">The Go Project</a></li> 
              <li><a href="http://golang.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">The Go programming language</a></li> 
              <li><a href="http://golang.org/doc/install/gccgo" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">gccgo</a> – complier for Go, front-end for GCC GNU compiler</li> 
              <li><a href="https://goji.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Goji</a> – web micro framework for Go</li> 
              <li><a href="http://gopheracademy.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Gopher Academy</a> – go education</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://electron.atom.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Electron</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>Build cross platform desktop apps with web technologies 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://photonkit.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">PhotonKit</a> – beautiful Electron apps using simple HTML and CSS</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="https://thrift.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Apache Thrift</strong></a> –&nbsp;cross-language services dev between C++, Java, Python, PHP, Ruby, Erlang, Perl, Haskell, C#, Cocoa, JavaScript, Node.js, Smalltalk, OCaml and Delphi and others</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.polymer-project.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Polymer</a> –&nbsp;</strong>web components</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://parse.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Parse</a></strong>&nbsp;– cloud-based app development framework</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://drupal.org/"><strong>Drupal</strong></a>&nbsp;</strong>– open source content management platform</li> 
            <li><a href="http://getfirebug.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Firebug</strong></a> –&nbsp;edit, debug, and monitor CSS, HTML, and JavaScript live in any web page</li> 
            <li><a href="http://fiddler2.com/home" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Fiddler</strong></a> –&nbsp;Debug web traffic from any Windows-based PC, Mac or Linux system, and mobile devices</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.joomla.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Joomla</a></strong> – another open source content management system</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://see.stanford.edu/Course" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Learn to Code</a></strong> – Stanford Computer Science classes – free</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.rust-lang.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Rust</a></strong> –&nbsp;systems programming language 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://doc.rust-lang.org/guide.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Rust Guide</a></li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.rustforrubyists.com/book/book.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Rust for Rubyists</a></li> 
              <li><a href="https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/second-edition/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Rust language tutorial</a> – MIT</li> 
              <li><a href="https://github.com/rust-lang/rust" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Rust on github</a></li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.sumologic.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>SumoLogic</strong></a> – analytics for the entire application stack</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3>Apple iOS and MacOs&nbsp;Development</h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><a href="https://developer.apple.com/osx/distribution/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>How to distribute a Mac iOS or OS X&nbsp;App</strong></a> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/IDEs/Conceptual/AppDistributionGuide/Introduction/Introduction.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40012582" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">App Distribution Guide</a> –&nbsp;distribute an app through the App Store or Mac App Store</li> 
              <li><a href="https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/LanguagesUtilities/Conceptual/iTunesConnect_Guide/Chapters/About.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">iTunes Connect</a>&nbsp;– how to build and submit an iOS app</li> 
              <li><a href="https://developer.apple.com/app-store/review/guidelines/mac/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">App Store guidelines</a></li> 
              <li><a href="https://developer.apple.com/app-store/testflight/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">TestFlight Beta Testing</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;how to test&nbsp;an iOS with 1000 testers</li> 
              <li class="reference"><a href="https://developer.apple.com/library/mac/documentation/IDEs/Conceptual/AppDistributionGuide/Introduction/Introduction.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">App Distribution Guide</a></li> 
              <li class="reference"><a href="http://www.apple.com/itunesnews/docs/AppStoreReportingInstructions.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Sales and Trends</a> – view how your product is doing</li> 
              <li class="reference"><a href="https://developer.apple.com/in-app-purchase/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">In-App Purchases</a></li> 
              <li class="reference"><a href="https://developer.apple.com/game-center/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Game Center</a></li> 
              <li class="reference"><a href="https://developer.apple.com/notifications/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Push Notifications</a></li> 
              <li class="reference"><a href="https://developer.apple.com/iad/resources/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">iAd</a></li> 
              <li class="reference"><a href="https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/StoreKit/Reference/NewsstandKit_Framework/index.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40010838" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">NewsStand</a> – delivering a newspaper or Magazine in iOS</li> 
              <li class="reference"><a href="https://github.com/MarcelloLins/Apple-Store-Crawler" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Apple Store Crawler</a> –&nbsp;crawler for Apps data from the iTunes Apple Store</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="https://developer.apple.com/swift/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Swift</strong></a> 
             <ul>

              <li><a href="https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/hdinsight/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Azure HDInsight</a>&nbsp;– managed Apache Hadoop, Spark, R, HBase, and Storm cloud service</li> 
             </ul> </li>

           <h3>Machine Learning/Deep Learning/Data Science</h3> 
           <p><a href="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/deep-learning.png"><img data-attachment-id="22563" data-permalink="https://steveblank.com/tools-and-blogs-for-entrepreneurs/deep-learning/" data-orig-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/deep-learning.png" data-orig-size="2847,2064" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;orientation&quot;:&quot;0&quot;}" data-image-title="deep-learning" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/deep-learning.png?w=300" data-large-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/deep-learning.png?w=468&amp;h=339" class="aligncenter size-large wp-image-22563" src="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/deep-learning.png?w=468&amp;h=339" alt="deep-learning" width="468" height="339" srcset="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/deep-learning.png?w=468&amp;h=339 468w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/deep-learning.png?w=936&amp;h=678 936w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/deep-learning.png?w=150&amp;h=109 150w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/deep-learning.png?w=300&amp;h=217 300w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/deep-learning.png?w=768&amp;h=557 768w" sizes="(max-width: 468px) 100vw, 468px"></a></p>

            <li id="2b94" class="graf graf--p graf-after--p"><a class="markup--anchor markup--p-anchor" href="http://machinelearningmastery.com/what-is-deep-learning/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">What is Deep Learning?</a> (machinelearningmastery.com)</li> 
            <li><a href="http://course.fast.ai" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Practical Deep Learning for coders</a> –&nbsp;Jeremy Howard</li> 
            <li id="3a94" class="graf graf--p graf-after--p"><a class="markup--anchor markup--p-anchor" href="https://blogs.nvidia.com/blog/2016/07/29/whats-difference-artificial-intelligence-machine-learning-deep-learning-ai/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">What’s the Difference Between Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning?</a> (nvidia.com)</li> 
            <li><a href="http://deeplearning.net/reading-list/tutorials/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">DeepLearning.net tutorials</a></li> 
            <li><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deep_learning" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Deep Learning Wikipedia</a>&nbsp;page</li> 
            <li><a href="https://plus.google.com/communities/112866381580457264725">Deep Learning- &nbsp;</a>Google+</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T0FEZYZqqV8&amp;feature=youtu.be" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Deep Learning Tutorial </a>– 2014 video&nbsp;John Kaufhold 
             <ul> 
              <li>slides <a href="https://drive.google.com/a/kandsranch.com/file/d/0B3aXKp9bt6OXQU5lU0lmOE1ZZjA/edit" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">here</a></li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="http://scikit-learn.org/stable/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Scikit-Learn</strong></a> – machine learning in Python 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://scikit-learn.org/stable/tutorial/machine_learning_map/index.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">How to Choose the Right Estimator</a> – great clickable diagram</li> 
              <li><a class="markup--anchor markup--p-anchor" href="http://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/jakevdp/sklearn_pycon2015/blob/master/notebooks/Index.ipynb" target="_blank" rel="noopener">PyCon scikit-learn Tutorial Index</a> (nbviewer.jupyter.org)</li> 
              <li><a class="markup--anchor markup--p-anchor" href="https://github.com/mmmayo13/scikit-learn-classifiers/blob/master/sklearn-classifiers-tutorial.ipynb" target="_blank" rel="noopener">scikit-learn Classification Algorithms</a> (github.com/mmmayo13)</li> 
              <li><a class="markup--anchor markup--p-anchor" href="http://scikit-learn.org/stable/tutorial/index.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">scikit-learn Tutorials</a> (scikit-learn.org)</li>
