           <h3><strong>Enterprise Data Center Operating Systems</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://radar.oreilly.com/2014/12/why-the-data-center-needs-an-operating-system.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Why the data center needs an os</a></strong> – O’Reilly</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.slideshare.net/sameertiwari33/scheduling-on-large-clusters" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Scheduling on Large Clusters</strong></a> – Tiwari</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.opencontainers.org/">Open Container Initiative</a></strong>&nbsp;is working to standardize the input into these systems</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.docker.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Docker</a>&nbsp;–</strong>&nbsp;open platform for distributed applications for developers and sysadmins 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="https://github.com/docker/distribution">Docker Distribution</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;open source registry</li> 
              <li><a href="https://hub.docker.com/">Docker Hub</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;Container Image Registry/Repository</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.oneops.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>OneOps</strong></a> – Walmart open source&nbsp;cloud management and application lifecycle management platform</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://coreos.com/rkt/docs/latest/">CoreOS rkt</a></strong></li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://linuxcontainers.org/">LXC</a></strong></li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/systemd-nspawn.html">systemd-nspawn</a></strong></li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://storm.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Storm</a></strong> –&nbsp;distributed realtime computation system on Mesos from twitter</li> 
            <li><a href="http://twitter.github.io/heron/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Heron</strong></a> –&nbsp;realtime, distributed, fault-tolerant stream processing engine from Twitter,&nbsp;API compatible with&nbsp;<a href="http://storm.apache.org/">Apache Storm</a></li> 
           </ul> 
           <p><strong>Container Orchestration System</strong></p> 
           <ul> 
            <li><a href="http://kubernetes.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Kubernetes</strong></a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;Manage a cluster of Linux containers as a single system from Google 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://research.google.com/pubs/pub41684.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Omega</a> – Google&nbsp;flexible, scalable schedulers for large compute clusters</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.wired.com/2013/03/google-borg-twitter-mesos/all/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Omega/Borg Overview</a> – Wired</li> 
              <li><a href="https://tectonic.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Tectonic</a> – commercial version of Kubernetes</li> 
              <li><a href="https://cloud.google.com/container-engine/">Google Container Engine (GKE)</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;(based on Kubernetes</li> 
              <li><a href="https://github.com/openai/kubernetes-ec2-autoscaler" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">OpenAiautoscaler</a> – &nbsp;batch-optimized scaling manager for Kubernetes</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="https://jenkins.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Jenkins</strong></a> – open source automation server</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://docs.docker.com/swarm/">Docker Swarm</a></strong></li> 
            <li><a href="http://reef.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Reef</strong></a> – library for&nbsp;data shuffle, group communication, aggregation, checkpointing, etc.</li> 
            <li><a href="http://slurm.schedmd.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Slurm</strong></a> –&nbsp;open-source workload manager designed for Linux clusters</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://mesos.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mesos</a></strong> –&nbsp;distributed systems kernel up to 10,000 nodes 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://www.antonlindstrom.com/2015/03/29/introduction-to-apache-mesos.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Tutorial</a><a style="line-height:1.5;" href="https://spark.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"> &nbsp;– anton lindstrom</a></li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.cs.berkeley.edu/~alig/papers/mesos.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mesos architecture paper</a> –&nbsp;Hindman, Konwinski, Zaharia,&nbsp;et al</li> 
              <li><a href="http://nerds.airbnb.com/introducing-chronos/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Chronos</a> –&nbsp;distributed and fault-tolerant scheduler on top of&nbsp;Mesos</li> 
              <li><a href="http://aurora.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Aurora</a><strong>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>a Mesos framework for long-running applications, services and cron jobs</li> 
              <li><a href="https://mesosphere.github.io/marathon/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Marathon</a> –&nbsp;cluster-wide init and control system for services in cgroups or Docker containers&nbsp;runs on top of&nbsp;Mesos</li> 
              <li><a href="https://github.com/mesos/hadoop" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Hadoop</a> – running on Mesos</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="https://mesosphere.com/product/">Mesosphere DCOS</a> 
             <ul> 
              <li>&nbsp;<a href="https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/azure-container-service-now-and-the-future/">Microsoft Azure Container Service</a>&nbsp;based on Mesosphere DCOS and Docker Swarm</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="https://aws.amazon.com/ecs/">Amazon EC2 Container Service (ECS)</a>. 
             <ul> 
              <li><strong><a href="https://mesosphere.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mesosphere</a></strong> –&nbsp;distributed systems for data centers</li> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://hadoop.apache.org/docs/current/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-site/YARN.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">YARN</a></strong> -Apache Hadoop NextGen MapReduce</li> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://zookeeper.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Zookeeper</a></strong>&nbsp;–&nbsp;centralized service for config, naming, distributed synchronization, group services</li> 
              <li><a href="http://oozie.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Oozie</strong></a> – workflow scheduler for Hadoop</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong>Workflow Monitoring Tools</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://gethue.com/category/oozie/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Hue</a>&nbsp;</strong>– import/export oozie workflows</li> 
              <li><a href="http://ambari.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Ambari</strong></a> – web app for monitoring and controlling hadoop</li> 
              <li><a href="http://techblog.netflix.com/2013/06/introducing-lipstick-on-apache-pig.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Lipstick</strong></a> – graphical depiction of Apache Pig workflow</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong>Production Host OS</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="https://github.com/coreos/etcd" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Coreos</strong></a> – linux for massive server deployments –&nbsp;shared configuration and service discovery</li> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://www.projectatomic.io/">Red Hat Project Atomic</a></strong></li> 
              <li><strong><a href="https://developer.ubuntu.com/en/snappy/">Ubuntu Snappy</a></strong></li> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://rancher.com/rancher-os/">Rancher OS</a></strong></li> 
             </ul> </li> 
           </ul> 
           <p><strong>Orchestration Configuration</strong></p> 
           <ul> 
            <li><a href="https://aws.amazon.com/cloudformation/">AWS CloudFormation</a></li> 
            <li><a href="https://cloud.google.com/deployment-manager/overview">Google Cloud Deployment Manager</a></li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3><a href="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/data-engineering-ecosystem.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="18482" data-permalink="https://steveblank.com/tools-and-blogs-for-entrepreneurs/data-engineering-ecosystem/" data-orig-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/data-engineering-ecosystem.jpg" data-orig-size="2088,1168" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;orientation&quot;:&quot;1&quot;}" data-image-title="Data Engineering Ecosystem" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/data-engineering-ecosystem.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/data-engineering-ecosystem.jpg?w=468&amp;h=262" class="aligncenter size-large wp-image-18482" src="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/data-engineering-ecosystem.jpg?w=468&amp;h=262" alt="Data Engineering Ecosystem" width="468" height="262" srcset="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/data-engineering-ecosystem.jpg?w=468&amp;h=262 468w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/data-engineering-ecosystem.jpg?w=936&amp;h=524 936w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/data-engineering-ecosystem.jpg?w=150&amp;h=84 150w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/data-engineering-ecosystem.jpg?w=300&amp;h=168 300w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/data-engineering-ecosystem.jpg?w=768&amp;h=430 768w" sizes="(max-width: 468px) 100vw, 468px"></a></h3> 
           <h3><strong>Data center orchestration and configuration management tools</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><a href="http://puppetlabs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Puppet</strong></a> –&nbsp;configuration management system</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.chef.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Chef</strong></a> –&nbsp;configuration management system</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.saltstack.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Saltstack</strong></a>–&nbsp;cloud orchestration, server provisioning, configuration management</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.ansible.com/home" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Ansible</strong></a> – Redhat configuration management, app deployment</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.spinnaker.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>Spinnaker</strong></a> – Google cloud continuous delivery</li> 
            <li><a href="http://cfengine.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>CFEngine</strong></a> –&nbsp;IT infrastructure automation</li> 
            <li><a href="http://nixos.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>NixOS</strong></a> – Linux&nbsp;configuration management system</li> 
            <li><a href="https://nifi.incubator.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Apache Nifi</strong></a> –&nbsp;dataflow system (directed graphs of data routing, transformation, and system mediation logic)</li> 
            <li><a href="http://flume.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Apache Flume</strong></a> –&nbsp;collect, aggregate and move large amounts of streaming event data</li> 
            <li><a href="http://camel.apache.org/what-is-camel.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Apache Camel</strong></a> – define routing and mediation rules</li> 
            <li><a href="http://kafka.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Apache Kafka</strong></a> –&nbsp;<span class="subtitle">high-throughput distributed messaging system</span></li> 
            <li><a href="http://www-03.ibm.com/software/products/en/ibm-streams" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>IBM Streams/DISTILLERY</strong></a> – platform for near-real-time streaming analytics</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3><strong>NoSQL Databases</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><a href="http://infolab.stanford.edu/~ullman/mmds.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Mining Massive Data Sets</strong></a> – awesome tutorial/text free</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.udacity.com/course/ud617" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Intro to Hadoop and MapReduce</strong></a> – Udacity Free class</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.coursera.org/course/dataanalysis" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Data Analysis class</strong></a> – Coursera free class</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://nosql-database.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">NoSQL list</a></strong> – start here for a list</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://hadoop.apache.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Hadoop</a></strong> –&nbsp;distributed processing of large data sets across clusters 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="https://pig.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Apache Pig </a>–&nbsp;platform for creating&nbsp;<a title="MapReduce" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MapReduce">MapReduce</a>&nbsp;programs</li> 
              <li><a href="http://hive.apache.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Apache&nbsp;Hive</a>&nbsp;– data warehouse for Hadoop</li> 
              <li><a href="http://hbase.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Apache HBase</a> &nbsp;– &nbsp;distributed database&nbsp;modeled after&nbsp;<a title="Google" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Google">Google’s</a>&nbsp;<a title="BigTable" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BigTable">BigTable</a> 
               <ul> 
                <li><a href="http://phoenix.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Apache Phoenix</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;massively parallel<a title="Relational database" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Relational_database">&nbsp;database</a>&nbsp;layer on top of&nbsp;Apache HBase</li> 
               </ul> </li> 
              <li><a href="http://spark.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Apache Spark</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;&nbsp;cluster computing&nbsp;framework</li> 
              <li><a href="https://zookeeper.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Apache ZooKeeper</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;distributed configuration service, synchronization service, and naming registry</li> 
              <li><a href="http://aws.amazon.com/elasticmapreduce/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Amazon Elastic MapReduce</a> (EMR) – Hosted Hadoop framework</li> 
              <li><a href="http://hortonworks.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">HortonWorks</a> – enterprise Hadoop 
               <ul> 
                <li><a href="http://hortonworks.com/products/hortonworks-sandbox/#overview" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">HortonWorks Sandbox</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;personal, portable Hadoop environment with a dozen Hadoop&nbsp;tutorials</li> 
               </ul> </li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="http://neo4j.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Neo4j</strong></a> – graph database</li> 
            <li><a href="https://accumulo.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Apache Accumulo</strong></a> –&nbsp;distributed key/value store&nbsp;based on Google’s&nbsp;<a title="BigTable" href="http://research.google.com/archive/bigtable.html">BigTable</a>&nbsp;design and is built on top of Apache&nbsp;<a title="Hadoop" href="http://hadoop.apache.org/">Hadoop</a>,&nbsp;<a title="Zookeeper" href="http://zookeeper.apache.org/">Zookeeper</a>, and&nbsp;<a title="Thrift" href="http://thrift.apache.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Thrift</a></li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://aws.amazon.com/rds/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Amazon RDS</a> – </strong>Cloud Relational Database</li> 
            <li><a href="http://aws.amazon.com/kinesis" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Amazon Kinesis</strong></a> –&nbsp;real-time processing of streaming data at massive scale</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://aws.amazon.com/dynamodb/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Amazon DynamoDB</a></strong> – NoSQL hosted on Amazon Web Services 
             <ul> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://basho.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Riak</a></strong>&nbsp;–<strong>&nbsp;</strong>NoSQL&nbsp;database&nbsp;implementing&nbsp;Amazon Dynamo</li> 
              <li><a href="https://github.com/Netflix/dynomite" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Dynomite</strong></a> – Netflix database cluster mgmt</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="https://github.com/Yelp/mrjob" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Yelp/mrjob</strong></a> – run map reduce on AWS or Hadoop</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://webscalesql.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">WebscaleSQL</a></strong> – Facebook open source MySQL for scale</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://cassandra.apache.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Cassandra</a></strong> – facebook open source scalable database no single point of failure</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://couchdb.apache.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Couchdb</a></strong> – document database</li> 
            <li><a href="http://redis.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Redis</strong></a> –&nbsp;data structure server</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.mongodb.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">MongoDb</a></strong> – &nbsp;NoSQL database</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.memsql.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>MemSQL</strong></a> – SQL in memory</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.rdbhost.com/"><strong>Rdbhost.com</strong></a><strong>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>browser&nbsp;SQL database hosting.Python/Javascript APIs</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3>GPU-optimized relational and column-store databases/Graph Analytics</h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.kinetica.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Kinetica</a></strong> –&nbsp;GPU accelerated database</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.gpudb.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">GPUdb</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>GPU accelerated in-memory distributed database</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.mapd.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">MapD</a> –&nbsp;</strong>GPU database for interactive SQL querying and visualization of multi-billion record datasets</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.blazegraph.com/product/gpu-accelerated/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Blazegraph</a> –</strong> GPU accelerated graph analytics</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://blazingdb.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">BlazingDB</a> – &nbsp;</strong>GPU accelerated data warehouse</li> 
            <li><a href="https://community.hortonworks.com/articles/60416/pg-storm-let-postgresql-run-faster-on-the-gpu.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>PG-Strom</strong></a> –&nbsp;PostgreSQL extension for GPUs</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3><strong>Development Tools</strong></h3> 
           <ul>

            <li><strong><a href="http://labs.codecademy.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Codeacademy Labs</a></strong> –&nbsp;program in Ruby, Python, and JavaScript online without downloading a code editor or IDE</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://koding.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Koding</a>&nbsp;– </strong>cloud development environment, code editor, hosting service, collaboration platform</li> 
            <li><a href="https://circleci.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>CircleCi</strong></a> – Continuous integration and deployment tool&nbsp;for web apps</li>

            <li><strong><a href="http://code.google.com/p/rietveld/">Rietveld</a> –</strong> asynchronous code reviews on changesets</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://fluidapp.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Fluid</a></strong> – turn webapps into Mac OS X apps</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://macromates.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">TextMate</a></strong> – code and markup editor</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.panic.com/coda/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Coda</a></strong> –&nbsp;one-window web development app for the Mac</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://krillapps.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Coderunner</a></strong> –&nbsp;Edit/run code in any programming language with a click</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.sourcelair.com/home/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SourceLair</a>&nbsp;</strong>–<strong>&nbsp;</strong>cloud coding platform&nbsp;C, Python, Ruby and API</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.netbiscuits.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>WebBiscuits</strong></a> – framework for web apps for smartphones and tablets</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://stackoverflow.com/questions/194812/list-of-freely-available-programming-books" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Best free programming books</a></strong></li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.codecademy.com/#!/exercise/0" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CodeAcademy</a></strong>&nbsp;– learn to code</li>

             <ul>

             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="http://appery.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Appery</strong></a>&nbsp;– Cloud-based HTML5, jQuery Mobile &amp; Hybrid Mobile App Builder for Android, iOS and Windows Phone</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3><strong>Project Management</strong></h3> 
           <h4><span style="line-height:1.5em;">Open-source software hosting</span></h4> 
           <ul style="line-height:1.5em;"> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.github.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Github</a></strong> –&nbsp;Free public repositories, collaborator management, issue tracking, wikis, downloads, code review, graphs 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://training.github.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Git Introduction</a>&nbsp;– learn Github</li> 
              <li><a href="http://rogerdudler.github.com/git-guide/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Git the Simple Guide</a> – the basics</li> 
              <li><a href="http://unfuddle.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Unfuddle</a>&nbsp;– Git and subversion hosting</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="http://sourceforge.net" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Sourceforge</strong></a> –&nbsp;Free. For open-source projects</li> 
            <li><a href="http://javaforge.com/project/JavaForge" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>JavaForge</strong></a> –&nbsp;free open source project hosting site</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://bitbucket.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Bitbucket</a></strong>&nbsp;– free cloud hosting for Git or Mecurial projects</li> 
            <li><a href="http://sourcetreeapp.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Sourcetree</strong></a> – free mac client for Git, Mercurial and SVN</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://mercurial.selenic.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Mercurial</a></strong>&nbsp;– free, distributed source code control management system</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.aha.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Aha</strong></a>! – product roadmap software</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h4><strong>Source Version Control Software</strong></h4> 
           <ul> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.perforce.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Perforce Helix</a></strong> –&nbsp;Connect teams, protect assets, and speed up your release cycles</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.atlassian.com/git" target="_blank" rel="noopener">GIT</a>&nbsp;– </strong>free open source version control&nbsp;system</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.nongnu.org/cvs/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>CVS </strong>(Concurrent Versions System)</a>&nbsp;– free open source a version control system</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.almtoolbox.com/clearcase.php" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>IBM/Rational Clearcase</strong></a> – &nbsp;Software Configuration Management</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Jira</a></strong>&nbsp;– Bug, Issue and classic Project tracking tool</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://subversion.apache.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Apache Subversion</a>&nbsp;</strong>– free&nbsp;open source&nbsp;software versioning and revision control system</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h4><strong>Kanban and Scrum Tools</strong></h4> 
           <ul style="line-height:1.5em;"> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://blogs.versionone.com/agile_management/2012/01/06/1-kanban-vs-scrum-myths-hype/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Kanban versus Scrum</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>description</li> 
            <li><strong>Kanban Tools</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://kanbantool.com/">Kanban Tool</a> – online, web-based,&nbsp;Kanban tool</li> 
              <li><a href="https://kanbanflow.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">KanbanFlow</a> – free Kanban tool</li> 
              <li><a href="http://swift-kanban.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Swift-Kanban</a>&nbsp;– enterprise Kanban</li> 
              <li><a href="http://kanbanery.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Kanbanery</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;Simple online team or personal kanban board</li> 
              <li><a href="http://leankitkanban.com/">LeanKit Kanban</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;Great for visualizing work of product development</li> 
              <li><a href="http://kanbanpad.com/">Kanban Pad</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;“Nice and lean” and free online Kanban tool</li> 
              <li><a href="http://intland.com/products/codebeamer/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CodeBeamer</a> – Kanban and Scrum tool&nbsp;Application Lifecycle Management</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.nutcache.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Nutcache</a> –&nbsp;all-in-one collaborative project management</li> 
              <li><a href="https://kanbanize.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Kanbanize</a> – free Kanban software</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong>Scrum Tools</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://www.telerik.com/teampulse" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">TeamPulse</a>&nbsp;-Scrum and Kanban</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.rallydev.com/">RallyDev</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;Automates Agile / Scrum development</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.yodiz.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">YoDiz</a>&nbsp;– agile/scrum tool, issue tracking</li> 
              <li><a href="http://versionone.com/">VersionOne</a>&nbsp;– agile product management and Scrum tool</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.agilescrum.pro" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">AgileScrumPro</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;Agile tool collaborative on an iPad</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.scrumy.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Scrumy</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;project management tool loosely based off of&nbsp;<a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scrum_(development)" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Scrum</a></li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.axosoft.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">OnTime &nbsp;Development Suite</a>&nbsp;(and&nbsp;<a href="http://www.ontimenow.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">here</a>) – provides bug tracking, scrum project management</li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.acunote.com/">Acunote</a>&nbsp;– Agile project management and Scrum</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.bananascrum.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Banana Scrum</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;A tool simple as Scrum itself.</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.basecamphq.com/"><strong>Basecamp</strong></a>– web-based project management and collaboration tool</li> 
            <li><a href="http://confulence%20project mgmt" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Confluence</strong></a> – Plan roadmaps, define product requirements, and centralize documentation</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.pivotaltracker.com/"><strong>Pivotal Tracker</strong></a><strong>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>Agile project management tool real time collaboration</li> 
            <li><strong><span style="color:#0000ee;"><u>Wrike</u></span>&nbsp;</strong>&nbsp;– combines&nbsp;project management, collaboration, discussion and document sharing</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.ansibleworks.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Ansible</a></strong> – configuration mgmt, app deployment, continuos delivery</li> 
            <li><a href="https://trello.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Trello</strong></a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;team collaboration around “boards”</li> 
            <li><a href="https://workflowy.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>Workflowy</strong></a> – hierarchial task manager</li> 
            <li><a href="http://asana.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Asana</strong></a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;shared task list for your team</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.wunderlist.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Wunderlist</strong></a> –&nbsp;light accountability and planning</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.sqwiggle.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Sqwiggle</strong></a> –&nbsp;all-hands meeting and updates</li> 
            <li><a href="https://quip.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Quip</strong></a> – team tasking</li> 
            <li><a href="https://sprint.ly" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Sprintly</strong></a> – agile collaborate&gt;prioritize&gt;create git integration</li> 
            <li><a href="https://podio.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Podio</strong></a> – collaborative project&nbsp;management</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.getflow.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Flow</strong></a> – collaborative task and&nbsp;project&nbsp;management</li>

            <li><strong><a href="http://www.clarizen.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Clarizen</a></strong>&nbsp;– cloud project mgmt tool</li>

           <ul style="line-height:1.5em;">

           <h3 style="line-height:1.5em;"><strong>Credit Cards/Billing/Subscription Management/E-Store</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li style="line-height:1.5em;"><strong>Credit Cards/Payments</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="https://squareup.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Square</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;accept credit cards from ipad/iphone/android</li> 
              <li><a href="https://stripe.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Stripe</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;accept credit cards on the web</li> 
              <li><a href="https://payments.amazon.com/business" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Amazon Payments</a> – login and pay with Amazon</li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.ccbill.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CCBill</a> – merchant services &amp; credit card payments</li> 
              <li><a href="https://gocardless.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">GoCardless</a>&nbsp;-accept direct debit payments</li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.balancedpayments.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Balanced</a> – Payments processing, escrow &amp; payouts API</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.bancbox.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">BancBox</a> – Payments service platform</li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.paypal.com/webapps/mpp/merchant" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Paypal</a> – the standard for payment 
               <ul> 
                <li><a href="https://www.billmelater.com/help/index.xhtml#merchants_sellers" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">BillMeLater</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;<span style="color:#666666;">PayPal service that lets you buy now and pay later</span></li> 
                <li><a href="https://cms.paypal.com/us/cgi-bin/?cmd=_render-content&amp;content_ID=developer/e_howto_api_WPWebsitePaymentsPro" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Paypal Payments Pro</a>&nbsp;– accept debt and credit cards on your website</li> 
               </ul> </li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.wepay.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">WePay</a> – &nbsp;payment API&nbsp;for platforms</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.e-junkie.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">E-Junkie</a> – shopping cart plug-in for downloads and tangible goods</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.sendowl.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SendOwl</a> – add a “Buy” button to your website</li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.2checkout.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">2Checkout</a> – accept payments globally; credit cards, paypal, debt cards</li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.shoplocket.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">ShopLocket</a> – ecommerce solution for hardware makers</li> 
              <li><a href="http://zombaio.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Zombaio</a> – billing for adult entertainment</li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.billpro.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Billpro</a> – “high risk” merchant account &amp; credit card processing</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.braintreepaymentsolutions.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Braintree</a>&nbsp;– online credit card merchant processing</li> 
              <li><a style="line-height:1.5em;" href="https://www.paymill.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Paymill</a><span style="line-height:1.5em;">&nbsp;– accept online payments on the web</span></li> 
              <li><a href="http://FeeFighters.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">FeeFighters</a><span style="line-height:1.5em;">&nbsp;– find the cheapest credit card processors</span></li> 
              <li><a href="https://venmo.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Venmo</a> – make and share payments on your phone</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
           </ul>

           <ul> 
            <li><strong><span style="line-height:1.5em;">Bitcoin/</span>Crypto<span style="line-height:1.5em;">&nbsp;Currencies</span></strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="https://github.com/McFrankline/Blockchain-stuff" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Curated list of Blockchain resources</a></li>

            <li style="line-height:1.5em;"><strong>Billing/Invoicing</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="https://open.tilt.com/donations" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Tilt</a><a href="http://www.ariasystems.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"> – </a>collect money from a group or&nbsp;on your site</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.ariasystems.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Aria</a>&nbsp;– online billing platform</li>

              <li><a href="https://cheddargetter.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CheddarGetter</a>&nbsp;– online recurring billing</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.getballpark.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Ballpark –&nbsp;</a>online invoicing, time tracking</li> 
              <li><a style="line-height:1.5em;" href="http://www.getballpark.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Chargify</a><a href="http://www.getballpark.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;–&nbsp;<span style="line-height:1.5em;">Recurring billing without the headaches</span></a></li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.chargebee.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Chargebee</a> – subscription &amp; reoccurring billing</li>

           <h3 style="line-height:1.5em;"><strong><a href="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/grow-customers.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="11118" data-permalink="https://steveblank.com/tools-and-blogs-for-entrepreneurs/grow-customers/" data-orig-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/grow-customers.jpg" data-orig-size="2346,1572" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="Grow Customers" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/grow-customers.jpg?w=300&amp;h=201" data-large-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/grow-customers.jpg?w=468" class="aligncenter size-medium wp-image-11118" title="Grow Customers" src="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/grow-customers.jpg?w=300&amp;h=201" alt="" width="300" height="201" srcset="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/grow-customers.jpg?w=300&amp;h=201 300w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/grow-customers.jpg?w=600&amp;h=402 600w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/grow-customers.jpg?w=150&amp;h=101 150w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px"></a></strong></h3> 
           <h3 id="firstHeading" class="firstHeading"><span dir="auto">Building information modeling</span></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><a href="http://www.autodesk.com/products/revit-family/overview" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Autodesk Revit</strong></a> –&nbsp;BIM solutions</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.vectorworks.net" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Vectorworks</strong></a> – 2/3D CAD and BIM solution</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.graphisoft.com/bimx/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>BIMx</strong></a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;sharing hypermodels</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.graphisoft.com/bimcloud/overview/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>BIMcloud</strong></a>&nbsp;– BIM in the Cloud</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.nemetschek-allplan.eu" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>AllPlan</strong></a> – EU BIM software</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.buildingsmart.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>OpenBIM</strong></a> – home of Open BIM&nbsp;collaboration via the IFC (Industry Foundation Classes) file format</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3 style="line-height:1.5em;"><strong>Customer Support/Feedback/Engagement</strong></h3> 
           <ul style="line-height:1.5em;"> 
            <li><a href="http://www.nirror.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Nirror</strong></a> – live support/watch playback of customer actions on your site</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.conversica.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Conversica</strong></a> – AI software for marketing, virtual sales assistant</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://tenderapp.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Tender</a></strong>&nbsp;– support, knowledgebase tool for your site</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://getsatisfaction.com/">GetSatisfaction</a></strong><strong>&nbsp;–</strong>&nbsp;conversations between companies / customers</li> 
            <li><a href="http://trii.be" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Triibe</strong></a> – incentive-based customer service</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.zendesk.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Zendesk</a></strong> – web help software</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.wise.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Wise.io</a></strong> – machine learning for customer success</li> 
            <li><a href="http://rollioforce.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Rollio</strong></a> –&nbsp;CRM now listens via Natural Language Processing</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.clickdesk.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Clickdesk</strong></a> – Help desk, live chat, social toolbar</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.zopim.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Zopim</strong></a> – real time customer support/live chat</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.helpscout.net" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>HelpScout</strong></a> – simple setup, easy integration, help desk software</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.desk.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Desk</a></strong> – from Salesforce, easy and simple; email/social/chat/phone</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.snapengage.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SnapEngage</a></strong>&nbsp;– live chat integrates with your apps</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://freshdesk.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Freshdesk</a></strong> – completely unique never seen before web help software</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.olark.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Olark</a></strong>&nbsp;– live customer chat and customer loyalty</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.livechatinc.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>LiveChat</strong></a> – live customer chat, archives of conversations</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.groovehq.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Groove</strong></a> – simple online Help Desk</li> 
            <li><a href="http://visitorengage.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>VisitorEngage</strong></a> – behavioral-based feedback button, surveys &amp; website notifications</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.assistly.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Assistly</a></strong>&nbsp;–&nbsp;Support customers by Web, email, chat, and social networks</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.thevisionworld.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Vision Helpdesk</a></strong> –&nbsp;Support for multiple companies from one place</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.onedesk.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>OneDesk</strong></a> – ideation to delivery and support&nbsp;issues, tickets, tasks</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.happyfox.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>HappyFox</strong></a> – collate, categorize and respond to all requests</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.customersure.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>CustomerSure</strong></a> – &nbsp;online customer service, feedback into retention</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.helpspot.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>HelpSpot</strong></a> – Helpdesk software</li> 
            <li><a href="http://webengage.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Webengage</strong></a> – engagement; website survey, feedback and notification tool</li> 
            <li><a href="https://supportbee.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>SupportBee</strong></a> – help customers via email, robust ticketing</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.jitbit.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>JitBit</strong></a> – Help desk ticketing system, cloud and on premises versions</li> 
            <li><a href="http://helprace.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>HelpRace</strong></a> –&nbsp;helpdesk, knowledge base and a feedback community in one platform</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.nethelpdesk.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>NetHelpDesk</strong></a> –&nbsp;Exchange sync, Smartphone apps</li> 
           </ul>

           <h3><strong>Password Managers</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.dashlane.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Dashlane</a></strong><strong> –</strong> password manager and digital wallet</li>

            <li><strong><a href="https://lastpass.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">LastPass</a></strong> –&nbsp;password manager</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://passwordsafe.sourceforge.net/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">passwordsafe</a></strong> –&nbsp;password manager</li>

            <li><strong><a href="https://keepersecurity.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">KeeperSecurity</a></strong> – password vault and online file storage</li> 
           </ul>

            <li style="line-height:1.5em;"><strong>Hardware Incubators/Accelerators</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://lemnoslabs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">LemnosLabs</a>&nbsp;– best hardware incubator in San Francisco</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.dragoninnovation.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Dragon Innovation</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;works with entrepreneurs to launch hardware products and scale their companies</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.hax.co" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Hax Accelerator</a> – hardware incubator/accelerator in&nbsp;Shenzhen, China</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.labix.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Flextronics Lab IX</a> -accelerator&nbsp;invests in seed stage startups that have beta or functional prototypes, and a well-developed business plan</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.thecrowdfundnetwork.com/inside-innoconn-foxconns-new-hardware-startup-incubator/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Innoconn</a> – Foxconn mobile incubator&nbsp;in Beijing</li> 
              <li><a href="http://blog.ycombinator.com/yc-for-hardware" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Y combinator for hardware</a></li> 
              <li><a href="http://highway1.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Highway1</a>&nbsp;– hardware accelerator in San Francisco</li> 
              <li><a href="http://springboard.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Springboard</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;techstars style hardware accelerator in London</li> 
              <li><a href="http://rgaaccelerator.com/connecteddevices/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">R/GA</a>&nbsp;– techstars style hardware accelerator in New York</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.zahncenternyc.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">ZahnCenter</a>&nbsp;– hardware incubator in New York</li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.bolt.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Bolt</a>&nbsp;– seed stage hardware fund in Boston and San Francisco</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong>Hardware Crowdfunding</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://www.crowdsupply.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Crowdsupply</a>&nbsp;– crowd funding for physical stuff</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.hwtrek.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">HWTrek</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;crowdfunding platform and community for hardware</li> 
              <li><a href="https://www.microryza.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Microyza</a> – crowdfunding for Science Research grants</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://riscv.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">RISC-V</a>– </strong>an open&nbsp;instruction-set&nbsp;architecture 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="https://github.com/riscv" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">RISC-V tools</a>– on github</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="https://chisel.eecs.berkeley.edu" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Chisel</strong></a> – open source hardware construction language&nbsp;for writing Scala programs that generate hardware</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.microcorelabs.com/mcl86.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">MCL86</a> – 8088/8086 implemented in a Xlinix FPGA</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3><strong>Robotics/Drones</strong></h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.ros.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">ROS</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>Robot Operating System – open source framework for writing robot software

             </ul> </li>

            <li><a href="http://gazebosim.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Gazebo</strong></a> – 3d Robot simulation software</li>

            <li><a href="http://www.openpilot.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>OpenPilot</strong></a> –&nbsp;Open Source UAV autopilot</li> 
            <li><a href="http://wiki.paparazziuav.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Paparazzi</strong></a> –&nbsp;open-source hardware and software &nbsp;autopilot &nbsp;for fixedwing &amp; multicopters</li> 
            <li><a href="http://diydrones.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>DIYDrones</strong></a> –&nbsp;community for amateur UAV’s</li> 
            <li><a href="http://qgroundcontrol.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>QGroundControl</strong></a> – open source UAV ground control operator station</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.dronedeploy.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>DroneDeploy</strong></a> – outsourced&nbsp;drones</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.emlid.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Navio+</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>raspberry pi autopilot</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.dronebase.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Dronebase</strong></a> –&nbsp;Get imagery &amp; video via drone</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.prandtl.design" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Prandtl</strong></a> – physics-based CAD for drones</li> 
           </ul> 
           <h3>Software Defined Radio (SR)</h3> 
           <ul> 
            <li><a href="http://greatscottgadgets.com/sdr/1/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>HackRF SDR Tutorial</strong></a>&nbsp;<strong>–&nbsp;</strong>great intro to SDR</li> 
            <li></li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kWfU1G3Jq4w" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Software Defined Radio Basic Tutorial</strong></a> –&nbsp;Schuyler St. Leger at Desert Code Camp</li> 
            <li><a href="http://gnuradio.org/redmine/projects/gnuradio/wiki" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>GNU Radio</strong></a> – open source software defined radio 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://gqrx.dk" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>GqrxSDR</strong></a> – open source SDR built on GNU Radio</li> 
              <li><a href="https://github.com/daniestevez/gr-satellites" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>GRSatellites</strong></a> – GNU Satellite telemetry decoders&nbsp;built on GNU Radio</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.nooelec.com/store/nesdr-mini-2-plus.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>NooElec</strong></a> – $20 USB RTL-SDR Receiver&nbsp;R820T2 tuner 25MHz-1750MHz</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.hdsdr.de" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>HDSDR</strong></a>&nbsp;– &nbsp;freeware&nbsp;Software Defined Radio&nbsp;(SDR) for Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10.</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://k1fm.us/2015/10/hdsdr-on-osx-the-easy-way-reloaded/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">HDSDR on OSX</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>freeware&nbsp;Software Defined Radio&nbsp;(SDR) for Mac&nbsp;OS X</li> 
            <li><a href="http://home.ettus.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>ETTUS Research</strong></a> – hardware for software defined radio</li> 
            <li><a href="https://greatscottgadgets.com/hackrf/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>HackRF</strong></a> –&nbsp;software defined radio&nbsp;10 MHz to 6 GHz 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://greatscottgadgets.com/hackrf/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>HackRF One</strong></a> –&nbsp;software defined radio half-duplex transceiver, 1&nbsp;<abbr title="Megahertz">MHz</abbr>&nbsp;– 6&nbsp;G<abbr title="Megahertz">Hz</abbr></li> 
              <li><a href="https://rad1o.badge.events.ccc.de/start" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>rad10</strong></a> – SDR&nbsp;half-duplex transceiver,&nbsp;50&nbsp;<abbr title="Megahertz">MHz</abbr>&nbsp;– 4&nbsp;G<abbr title="Megahertz">Hz works with HackRF</abbr></li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><a href="http://sdr.osmocom.org/trac/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>OsmoSDR</strong></a> –&nbsp;Software based small form-factor inexpensive Software Defined Radio</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.crowdsupply.com/lime-micro/limesdr" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>LimeSDR</strong></a> – open source SDR</li> 
            <li><span style="color:#0000ee;"><b><u>Nuanced</u></b></span>&nbsp;– USB 3.0&nbsp;software defined radio&nbsp;300MHz – 3.8GHz</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.funcubedongle.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">FUNCube dongle</a></strong>&nbsp;–&nbsp;software defined radio<em>&nbsp;</em>150kHz to 1.9GHz<em>&nbsp;</em></li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.nuand.com/blog/product/bladerf-x40/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>BladeRf x40</strong></a> –&nbsp;low-cost USB 3.0 Software Defined Radio</li> 
            <li><strong><span style="color:#0000ee;"><u>Ethos</u></span><a href="http://www.ettus.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;Research</a></strong> – software defined radio development platforms</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.eetutorial.net/sdr-showdown-hackrf-vs-bladerf-vs-usrp/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>SDR Showdown</strong></a> – HackRF vs bladeRF vs USRP tutorial</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.flexradio.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>FlexRadio</strong></a> –&nbsp;software defined radio for ham operators</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://www.lora-alliance.org/What-Is-LoRa/Technology" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">LoRa Alliance</a></strong> – low power wide area network</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.sigfox.com/en/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Sigfox</strong></a> – &nbsp;cellular tech for IoT</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.ingenu.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Ingenu</strong></a> – dedicated IoT connection</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.beepnetworks.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Beep Networks</strong></a> – real world data to the cloud</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.rtl-sdr.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>RTL-SDR</strong></a> – news and projects blog</li> 
            <li><a href="http://gnuradio.org/redmine/projects/gnuradio/wiki/GNURadioCompanion" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>GNURadioCompanion</strong></a> –&nbsp;a graphical tool for creating signal flow graphs and generating flow-graph source code</li> 
           </ul>

            <li><a style="line-height:1.5;" href="http://octopart.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Octopart</strong></a><span style="line-height:1.5;"> – search engine for electronic parts</span> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://octopart.com/blog/archives/2013/11/what-every-hardware-startup-should-know-about-the-electronic-component-landscape" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">What every hardware startup should know about parts</a></li> 
              <li><a href="http://octopart.com/blog/archives/2013/10/electronic-component-purchasing-for-manufacturing" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Component purchasing for manufacturing</a></li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://componentsearch.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">ComponentSearch</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>search 300 million data sheets by part number</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.sandsquid.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>SandSquid</strong></a> – magic! automated parts finder from a bill of material</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.rs-online.com/designspark/electronics/eng/page/mechanical" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">DesignSparkMechanical</a> – free mechanical design software</li> 
            <li><a href="http://std.iec.ch/cdd/iec61360/iec61360.nsf/TreeFrameset?OpenFrameSet" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>IEC Common Data Dictionary</strong></a> –&nbsp;reference for component properties</li> 
           </ul> 
           <ul style="line-height:1.5em;"> 
            <li><strong>Printed Circuit Boards (PCB’s) printers</strong>

            <li><strong>PCB Design Tools</strong> 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="https://www.snapeda.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SnapEDA</a><a href="https://github.com/boldport/pcbmode" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"> – PCB design tool w/downloadable parts library</a></li> 
              <li><a href="https://github.com/boldport/pcbmode" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">BoldPort</a> –&nbsp;Python script that creates an SVG from&nbsp;JSON files, and creates&nbsp;<a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gerber_format">Gerber</a>&nbsp;and Excellon files for manufacturing</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.rs-online.com/designspark/electronics/eng/page/designspark-pcb-home-page" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">DesignSparkPCB</a> -free PCB design software</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.altium.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Altium</a>– PCB Design Tools</li> 
              <li><a href="https://cadsoft.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Eagle</a> – CadSoft schematic capture PCB design tool</li> 
              <li><a href="http://upverter.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Upverter</a>&nbsp;– collaborative circuit design</li> 
              <li><a href="http://blog.upverter.com/the-hardware-product-canvas" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Hardware Product Canvas</a> –&nbsp; hardware building block tool</li> 
              <li><a href="https://circuits.io/pcb" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">circuits.io</a>&nbsp;– free circuit editor/pcb layout in your browser (by Autodesk)</li> 
              <li><a href="http://circuitmaker.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CircuitMaker</a> – free EDA tool from Altium</li> 
              <li><a href="http://kicad-pcb.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">KiCad</a> – schematic capture and PCB layout</li> 
              <li><a href="http://fritzing.org/home/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Fritzing</a> – PCB and parts library</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.pcbweb.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">PCBWeb</a> – free PCB design software</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.digikey.com/schemeit/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Scheme-it</a> – free online schematic drawing/sharing app (part of Digikey)</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong>Integrated Design Environment</strong> (IDE) 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="http://www.cypress.com/products/psoc-creator-integrated-design-environment-ide" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">PSoC Creator</a> -hardware/firmware editing, compiling, debugging of PSoC 3/4, 4 BLE, PRoC BLE, PSoC 5LP and FM0+ systems</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.st.com/en/embedded-software/stm32cube-embedded-software.html?querycriteria=productId=LN1897" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">STM32Cube</a> – IDE for STM32</li> 
              <li><a href="http://www.st.com/en/development-tools/sw4stm32.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SW4STM32</a> – free system workbench for&nbsp;STM32: free IDE on Windows, Linux and OS X</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
           </ul> 
           <ul style="line-height:1.5em;">

            <li><a href="http://www.voxel8.co" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Voxel8</strong></a> -3D electronics printing</li> 
            <li><a href="http://spark.autodesk.com/ember" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Ember</strong></a> – 3D printer from Autodesk</li> 
            <li><a href="http://bigrep.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>BigRep</strong></a> – Full Scale 3D printer</li> 
           </ul> 
           <p><strong>Low cost 3D/CAM Software</strong></p> 
           <ul> 
            <li><a href="http://www.openscad.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>OpenSCAD</strong></a> – opensource&nbsp;Programmers Solid 3D CAD Modeller</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.tinkercad.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>TinkerCAD</strong></a> – great 3D CAD software for beginners</li> 
            <li><a href="http://solvespace.com/index.pl" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>SolveSpace</strong></a> – opensource&nbsp;parametric 3d CAD program</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.freecadweb.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>FreeCAD</strong></a> –&nbsp;opensource&nbsp;parametric 3d CAD modeler</li> 
            <li><a href="http://verbnurbs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Verb</strong></a> – CAD Library for the web</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.deskproto.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Deskproto</a></strong></li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.mecsoft.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">VisualMILL</a></strong></li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.madcamcnc.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">madCAM</a></strong></li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.grzsoftware.com/landing/">MeshCAM</a></strong></li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.picasoftus.com/">Mayka</a></strong></li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.cadcrowd.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">CADCrowd</a> –&nbsp;</strong>find freelancers for 3D design &amp; CAD modeling</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="https://grabcad.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">GrabCAD</a></strong>&nbsp;– community and workbench for 
             <ul> 
              <li><a href="https://grabcad.com/library" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">GrabCAD model library</a> –&nbsp;open source CAD files available for different software like Solid Works, SolidEdge, Autodesk</li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://lcamtuf.coredump.cx/gcnc/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Guerrilla guide to CNC machining, mold making, and resin casting</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>awesome</li> 
           </ul>

           <h4 style="font-size:medium;">3D Printing Services</h4> 
           <ul style="line-height:1.5em;"> 
            <li><a href="http://spark.autodesk.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Spark</strong></a>– Autodesks open and free 3D printing platform</li> 
            <li><a href="http://3dprint.nih.gov" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>NIH 3D Print Exchange</strong></a> – biomedical 3d printable files and resources 
             <ul> 
              <li><strong><a href="http://3dprint.nih.gov/discover" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">NIH biomedical 3D printable models</a></strong></li> 
             </ul> </li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.thingiverse.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Thingiverse</a></strong>–&nbsp; –&nbsp;biggest repository of free 3D printable files</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.redeyeondemand.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Redeye</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>3d printing service – autodesk files</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.sculpteo.com/en/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Sculpteo</strong></a>&nbsp;– 3d printing service</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.shapeways.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Shapeways</strong></a>&nbsp;– 3d marketplace and community</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.3dprototype.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">3-D Prototype Design</a></strong>&nbsp;– 3D professional parts printing</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.reprap.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">RepRap</a></strong>&nbsp;– open source 3D Printing</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://www.makergear.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">MakerGear</a></strong>&nbsp;– homebrew 3D Printing</li> 
            <li><strong><a href="http://i.materialise.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">i.materialize</a></strong>&nbsp;– 3D parts printing service</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.solidconcepts.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>SolidConcepts</strong></a> –&nbsp;3D parts printing service w/custom finishing</li> 
            <li><a href="https://www.ponoko.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Ponoco</strong></a> – 3D printing, laser cutting service, buy/sell/community</li> 
            <li><a href="https://sunglass.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Sunglass.io</strong>&nbsp;</a>– apps to&nbsp;share and collaborate around 3D content</li> 
            <li><a href="http://on3dprinting.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>On3DPrinting</strong></a> – good 3D news blog</li> 
            <li><a href="http://www.3dhubs.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>3DHubs</strong></a> – crowdsourced local 3D printing</li> 
            <li><a href="http://3dprintboard.com/forum.php" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>3DPrintBoard</strong></a> – forum for 3D printing</li> 
            <li><a href="https://plus.google.com/communities/117814474100552114108" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Google+ 3D printing community</strong></a></li>

           </ul>

            <h3 style="line-height:1.5em;">CubeSats / &nbsp;Nanosatellites</h3> 
            <ul> 
             <li style="line-height:1.5em;"><a href="http://www.pocketqubeshop.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>PocketQube</strong></a> – small cubesat off the shelf</li> 
             <li style="line-height:1.5em;"><a href="http://www.cubesatkit.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>CubesatKit</strong></a> –&nbsp;cube-sat off the shelf</li> 
             <li style="line-height:1.5em;"><a href="http://www.nasa.gov/directorates/spacetech/centennial_challenges/cubequest/index.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>NASA Cubesat Challenge</strong></a> –&nbsp;competition for the developments of cubesats to fly to the Moon</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.clyde-space.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>ClydeSpace</strong></a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;&nbsp;cubesat and nanosatellites</li> 
             <li style="line-height:1.5em;"><a href="http://www.spaceflightindustries.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>SpaceflightInc</strong></a> – cubesat and small satellite launch</li> 
             <li style="line-height:1.5em;"><a href="https://spire.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Spire</strong></a> – using cubesats for weather and maritime data</li> 
             <li style="line-height:1.5em;"><a href="https://www.planet.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>PlanetLabs</strong></a> – using nanosats for imagery</li> 
             <li style="line-height:1.5em;"><a href="http://www.cubesat.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Cubesat.org</strong></a> –&nbsp;collaboration of over 40 universities, high schools, and private firms developing picosatellites</li> 
            </ul>

            </ul> 
            <h3>Digital Health</h3> 
            <p><a href="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-hospital.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="22765" data-permalink="https://steveblank.com/tools-and-blogs-for-entrepreneurs/digital-hospital/" data-orig-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-hospital.jpg" data-orig-size="1822,1536" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;orientation&quot;:&quot;1&quot;}" data-image-title="digital-hospital" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-hospital.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-hospital.jpg?w=468&amp;h=395" class="aligncenter size-large wp-image-22765" src="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-hospital.jpg?w=468&amp;h=395" alt="digital-hospital" width="468" height="395" srcset="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-hospital.jpg?w=468&amp;h=395 468w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-hospital.jpg?w=936&amp;h=790 936w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-hospital.jpg?w=150&amp;h=126 150w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-hospital.jpg?w=300&amp;h=253 300w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-hospital.jpg?w=768&amp;h=647 768w" sizes="(max-width: 468px) 100vw, 468px"></a></p> 
            <p><a href="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-health.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="14599" data-permalink="https://steveblank.com/tools-and-blogs-for-entrepreneurs/digital-health/" data-orig-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-health.jpg" data-orig-size="1432,808" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="digital health" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-health.jpg?w=300&amp;h=169" data-large-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-health.jpg?w=468" class="aligncenter size-medium wp-image-14599" src="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-health.jpg?w=300&amp;h=169" alt="digital health" width="300" height="169" srcset="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-health.jpg?w=300&amp;h=169 300w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-health.jpg?w=600&amp;h=338 600w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/digital-health.jpg?w=150&amp;h=85 150w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px"></a></p> 
            <ul> 
             <li><a href="http://rockhealth.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">RockHealth</a> – Digital Healthcare Incubator</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.fda.gov/downloads/MedicalDevices/DeviceRegulationandGuidance/GuidanceDocuments/UCM263366.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">FDA Draft Guidance for Mobile Health Devices</a></li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.slideshare.net/RockHealth/fda-101-a-guide-to-the-fda-for-digital-health-entrepreneurs" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Guide to FDA Approval for Digital Health</a> – RockHealth</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.slideshare.net/RockHealth/the-entrepreneurs-guide-to-hospital-partnerships" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Partnering with Hospitals for Pilots</a> – RockHealth</li> 
             <li><a href="http://www.slideshare.net/RockHealth" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">RockHealth Presentations</a></li>

           <p><a href="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/mobile-digital-health1.png"><img data-attachment-id="18938" data-permalink="https://steveblank.com/tools-and-blogs-for-entrepreneurs/mobile-digital-health/" data-orig-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/mobile-digital-health1.png" data-orig-size="1344,864" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;orientation&quot;:&quot;0&quot;}" data-image-title="mobile digital health" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/mobile-digital-health1.png?w=300" data-large-file="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/mobile-digital-health1.png?w=468&amp;h=301" class="aligncenter size-large wp-image-18938" src="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/mobile-digital-health1.png?w=468&amp;h=301" alt="mobile digital health" width="468" height="301" srcset="https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/mobile-digital-health1.png?w=468&amp;h=301 468w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/mobile-digital-health1.png?w=936&amp;h=602 936w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/mobile-digital-health1.png?w=150&amp;h=96 150w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/mobile-digital-health1.png?w=300&amp;h=193 300w, https://steveblank.files.wordpress.com/2011/02/mobile-digital-health1.png?w=768&amp;h=494 768w" sizes="(max-width: 468px) 100vw, 468px"></a></p> 
           <div style="line-height:1.5em;"> 
            <ul> 
             <li><strong><a href="http://www.addgene.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">AddGene</a>&nbsp;–&nbsp;</strong>a better way to share plasmids</li>
